Welcome To
The Frame Shop

We are a family business, with 40 years of knowledge and expertise in all aspects of Custom Picture Framing, who have been proudly serving Yuba City and the surrounding area for over 26 years.

Our mission is to provide our customers with the finest quality information, products, and services our industry has to offer with the goal of making your visit a pleasing and memorable experience that will make you a lifetime customer.
